title: Romania: appeal of communist-era prison commander adjourned because he had no lawyer
text:
Published By: Fox News: World - Today 
A hearing on the appeal of a 90-year-old communist-era prison guard sentenced to 20 years for crimes against humanity has been quickly adjou...
